title: Bug 16822: Search results not cleared after moving file
OB: Move X.java to 'P/src2'. Observe: The search result is still present in the search view. Attempting to double-click on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog, stating: 'An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.'
EB: Bug 16822: Search results should be automatically removed when the file 'X.java' is moved.
SR: Ensure that after moving 'X.java' to 'P/src2', the search results are promptly cleared, and attempting to open the moved file from the search view does not result in a 'Search Error' dialog.
